desc: Lota is a free online EPUB reader, support all platforms (Web, Windows, Linux, MacOS, Android, iOS). Read multiple books at the same time. Read seamlessly between different devices.

0.title: Progressive web app
0.desc: Lota is progressive web app (PWA), which means it is cross-platform and installable.

1.title: Offline first
1.desc: Lota can be run offline (after installation), and when not offline, Lota will update automatically.

2.title: Grid layout
2.desc: Lota supports (horizontal) grid layout, which allows you to read multiple books at the same time.

3.title: Custom cloud storage
3.desc: Store your books, notes, reading progress and even other data in the cloud you specified.
